title: CVE-2022-3143 vulnerability for wildfly-elytron dependencies maven
body:
### Describe the bug

CVE-2022-3143 vulnerability for wildfly-elytron dependencies maven:
Maven dependency check tool has identified below vulnerabilities in quarkus upon including dependency - `quarkus-elytron-security-properties-file`

```shell
[ERROR] wildfly-elytron-credential-1.20.1.Final.jar: CVE-2022-3143(7.4)
[ERROR] wildfly-elytron-password-impl-1.20.1.Final.jar: CVE-2022-3143(7.4)
[ERROR] wildfly-elytron-x500-1.20.1.Final.jar: CVE-2022-3143(7.4)
```

Ref: https://jeremylong.github.io/DependencyCheck/ 

### Expected behavior

Provide fixed version for quarkus dependency `quarkus-elytron-security-properties-file` that mitigates this CVE vulnerability 

### Actual behavior

Currently no available version for `quarkus-elytron-security-properties-file` that mitigates this CVE vulnerability 

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Windows 11 

### Output of `java -version`

17.0.2

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.16.5.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

$ mvn --version Apache Maven 3.8.1 (05c21c65bdfed0f71a2f2ada8b84da59348c4c5d) Maven home: C:\apache-maven-3.8.1 Java version: 17.0.2, vendor: Oracle Corporation, runtime: C:\jdk-17.0.2 Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: Cp1252 OS name: "windows 11", version: "10.0", arch: "amd64", family: "windows"

### Additional information

_No response_
